title: Free Demo Classes
description: Take as many demo classes as you want and decide for yourself the quality of education offered here.

title: Learn from home
description: No need to run around coaching centres. Get personalized one-to-one, face-to-face interactive classes from the safety of your home

title: Affordable Prices
description: Not everybody comes from the same economic background, and I understand that. We will decide prices as per your parents's economic condition. Don't worry about the prices, as it would never be a problem.

title: Study Mathematics with Real Life Applications and Stories
description: Gone are the days when Mathematics was a boring subject. Take the demo classes and you will understand what Mathematics really is. We will uncover the beauty behind mathematics

title: Doubts Solving and Indepth Analysis
description: Indepth discussion of problems. We will work more on the topics that need focus.I will give your personalized performance analysis regulalry and we will together identifying the weak area.

title: Courses Offered
description: CBSE XII+IIT JEE, CBSE XI+ CBSE XII+ IIT-JEE, IIT-JEE, CBSE XII, CBSE XI, CBSE XII+ CBSE XI
